short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Enhance your productivity with the Physics & Mechanics Toolkit

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Birdeye Mechanics Toolkit is a versatile and user-friendly extension designed to simplify key physics calculations. Ideal for students, engineers, and hobbyists, this toolkit includes four essential calculators:

Arrow Speed Calculator: Quickly determine the speed of an arrow based on various input parameters.
Free Fall Calculator: Accurately calculate the distance and velocity of an object in free fall.
Stopping Distance Calculator: Estimate the stopping distance of a vehicle considering speed, reaction time, and braking efficiency.
Rolling Resistance Calculator: Compute the rolling resistance force experienced by a moving object on different surfaces.
With Birdeye Mechanics Toolkit, complex physics computations are just a click away, providing precise results and enhancing your understanding of fundamental mechanics.
